title: Fps capped at 20
body:
i just updated today, and now when i play, my fps is capped at 20, and sometimes when i play, it spikes back to 60 fps, which i normally play at. 

changing the video settings does nothing, and i am at a loss of what to do. Any help would be appreciated

Thank you.

replies.body: You may have some outdated drivers or bad game files causing your FPS to drop, but there's been a recent issue with a Windows product as well.  If you recently updated Windows 10, it auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing fps drops for some players.  Disabling that can help restore your FPS, but if you continue to have issues then go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot this for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
